sentence.Network_en: Torn between anger and self - reproach, he could hardly fall asleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又是气愤,又埋怨自己, 简直没法睡着.

sentence.Network_en: His self - reproach arose from the deplorable event in Wimpole Street.
sentence.Network_cn: 温波尔街发生的痛心事件引起了他的内疚.

sentence.Network_en: But the mood of self - reproach was short - lived.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而这种 自我批评 好景不长.
